main.name: Henry Liu Pan
main.description: Software Engineer | Ballroom Dancer | Tea Connoisseur
main.bio: My name is Henry Pan. I'm a 3rd year Computer Science student, currently studying at Georgia Tech on an Exchange Program and I love everything about this field, from intense sleep deprived hackathons to developing impactful projects.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science / Commerce
education.specialization: Data Structures, Object Orientation, Agile Development, Relational Database

education.school: Georgia Institute of Technology - Student Exchange Program
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Studying Design & Analysis of Algorithms, Intro to Artificial Intelligence, Consumer Behaviour, Intro to Cognitive Science

research.name: TicTacToe
research.d1: Built the game of TicTacToe using fundamentals of Reactjs

research.name: Healthy Bois
research.d1: Created the back-end Health Care System with Object Oriented Programming using Python and Flask
research.d2: Developed the front-end website, improving user experience using HTML, CSS, Materialize and Bootstrap
research.d3: Followed an Agile Software Development Approach, constructing Epic Stories, Use-case diagrams and Entity Relationship Models

research.name: SC2 Bot
research.d1: Created a Starcraft 2 AI Bot from a set API that sometimes beats Hard AI using simple logic
research.d2: Used numpy and Opencv to visualise the map of the game as it runs
research.d3: Created neural network with Keras and Tensorflow, feeding recorded training data into network, improving win rate by 10% with evolutionary algorithm

research.name: Sydney Sideways
research.d1: Designed and implemented a database system using Oracle SQL for crewmembers of airlines to efficiently access information
research.d2: Constructed Entity Relationship Models (and relational database model) to aid in implementing database
research.d3: Revised and normalised models to create a database with efficient storage and preventing information silos

projects.title: Healthy Bois Website
projects.category: A website that allows patients and doctors set appointments.

projects.title: SC2 Bot
projects.category: A bot that plays the game of Starcraft and defeats hard bots.
